links.title: INVESTOR PRESENTATION
links.content:
Peraso Corporate Overview
October 2024
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc.
DISCLAIMER
This presentation is for information purposes only. Certain information contained herein has been derived from sources prepared by third parties. While such
information is believed to be reliable for the purposes used herein, we makes no representation or warrant with respect to the accuracy of such information. This
presentation uses Peraso’s trademarks. This presentation may also include trademarks, logos, trade names and service marks that are the property of others.
Trademarks, logos, trade names and service marks referred to in this presentation may appear without the ® and , but those references are not intended to indicate
that Peraso will not asserts its rights, or that the applicable owner will not assert its rights, to the fullest extent under applicable law. The trademarks, logos, trade
names and service marks appearing in this presentation belong to their respective owners and do not provide or imply any endorsement, sponsorship or affiliation.
This presentation contains forward-looking statements. All statements other than statements of historical facts contained in this presentation, including statements
regarding the completion of business combination, the future results of operations, business strategy, timing, capabilities, and likelihood of success of combined
company, and plans and objectives of its potential management for future operations, are forward-looking statements. Forward-looking statements also include
statements regarding the expected benefits of the proposed business combination. These statements involve known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other
important factors that may cause our actual results, performance or achievements to be materially different from any future results, performance or achievements
expressed or implied by the forward-looking statements. Because forward-looking statements are inherently subject to risks and uncertainties, some of which cannot
be predicted or quantified and some of which are beyond our control, you should not rely on these forward-looking statements as predictions of future events. The
events and circumstances reflected in our forward-looking statements may not be achieved or occur and actual results could differ materially from those projected in
the forward-looking statements. Moreover, we operate in an evolving environment. New risk factors and uncertainties may emerge from time-to-time, and it is not
possible for management to predict all risk factors and uncertainties. Except as required by applicable law, neither company plans to publicly update or revise any
forward-looking statements contained herein, whether as a result of any new information, future events, changed circumstances or otherwise. Other important
assumptions and factors that could cause actual results to differ materially from forward-looking statements, including discussions of significant risk factors, may
appear in Peraso’s public filings with the SEC, which are accessible at www.sec.gov, and which you are advised to consult.
This presentation does not constitute an offer to sell, or the solicitation of an offer to buy, any securities, nor shall there be any sale of securities in any states or
jurisdictions in which such offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful.
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 2
Peraso At A Glance
Pioneer in high-performance 60 GHz unlicensed
mmWave Product Portfolio
and 5G mmWave wireless technology
Targeting Diverse End Markets
❑ A global leader in the development and sales of
Fixed Wireless Access Military/Defense Comms.
semiconductor devices and phased array antenna modules
used for mmWave communications PRM2140X Module Family PRS1520 Module
❑ Shipping in volume since 2016, with products deployed
globally across North America, Africa, China and Japan
❑ 50 issued and pending mmWave patents, including 9
essential claims patents for the IEEE 802.11ay standard
❑ Secured and expanding design wins across diverse market
applications, including fixed wireless access (FWA), defense,
transportation and advanced video delivery
Professional Video Delivery 5G Antenna Module
❑ End-of-life memory IC product line providing significant
PRS1520 Module
contribution through Q1 2025
Ticker: PRSO (NASDAQ)
Headquarters: San Jose, CA
Founded: 2008
Employees: 43
Patents: 145
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 3
What is mmWave?
A very high frequency band, typically from 24GHz to 300Ghz
➢ mmWave can carry more data, transmit data more quickly and resolve congestion
compared to traditional cellular frequencies (sub 6GHz)
Electromagnetic Spectrum
Wavelength
Frequency <700 60 6>6100
MHz GHz G H GzHz
mmWave
Fixed Wireless Access
Military/Defense Comms.
Peraso focused on 24GHz to 60GHz spectrum Fixed Wireless Access
leveraging mmWave beamforming
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 4
Shipping Into Multiple High-Growth Markets
Fixed Wireless Access Tactical Communications Transportation Professional Video Delivery
Peraso is a global leader in providing Peraso technology enables stealth Peraso enables a variety of Peraso solves the challenge of high
60GHz semiconductor devices for battlefield communications, which transportation communications, wireless congestion found with
gigabit last-mile broadband is critical in modern warfare including high-velocity roaming traditional WiFi communications
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 5
Multi-Billion Dollar Market Opportunity
➢ Global mmWave technology market valued at $3.4B, forecast to grow at 20% CAGR(1)
▪ Unlicensed frequency dominated mmWave technology industry revenue in 2023,
anticipated to grow the fastest during the forecast period
Millimeter Wave Technology Market(1) 5G mmWave-capable Device Unit Shipments(2)
+22%
20.4% CAGR
$17.9B +63%
$3.4B
Allied Market Research Global mobile Supplier Association
➢ FWA customer premises equipment (CPE) shipments surpassed Cable CPE in 2Q 2024(3)
▪ 5G mmWave FWA ramping and to grow 22% in 2024, still under 10% all 5G device shipments(2)
(1) Allied Market Research, Millimeter Wave Technology Market Research | August 2024
(2) Global mobile Supplier Association, 4G-5G FWA Survey 2024 | August 2024
(3) Dell'Oro Group, ‘Light Reading’ CInotperyvriiegwht |© S e2p0t2e4m Pbeerra s2o0 2In4c. 6
Fixed Wireless Access - Rural
➢ MmWave operates in unlicensed 60GHz frequency
band; spectrum is free
➢ Peraso is a leading technology provider to WISPs
in the race to provide the market with Gigabit internet
➢ Peraso technology enables Internet access rivaling
fiber performance, with benefits such as low cost of
deployment and faster time to market
➢ Lead customer, Ubiquiti, shipping into American rural
market since 2019
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 7
Fixed Wireless Access - Dense Urban
Peraso-enabled
➢ Expanding into global dense urban markets, with significantly
deployments
more end users than traditional rural
➢ 2.6 billion people, or one-third of global population, remain
offline (ITU, December 2023)
▪ Over 1.1B people living in informal settlements (World Economic Forum)
Los Angeles (WeLink)*
Peraso “DUNE” Platform
➢ Designed for Dense Urban Network Environment (“DUNE”)
➢ Integrated HW/SW solution utilizing mmWave modules
South Africa
➢ Fundamental technology advantages:
▪ DUNE access protocol, beamforming, multi-gigabit, low latency
➢ Received first commercial order in early 2024
North America
*contract awarded in support of planned deployment
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 8
BEAD Support Extended to mmWave Solutions
➢ Broadband Equity, Access, and Deployment (BEAD) Program
▪ Federal grant program funded through the U.S. Department of Commerce
▪ Overseen by National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA)
▪ Tasked with allocating $42.45 billion to broaden high-speed internet access in all 50 states
➢ BEAD program internet access priority areas:
▪ Unserved locations (No access to 25/3 Mbps)
▪ Underserved locations (No access to 100/20 Mbps)
➢ NTIA recently expanded guidance on eligible technologies
▪ Now includes unlicensed spectrum FWA solutions, including mmWave
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 9
Tactical Communications
•➢PTreardaitsioonal wireless communication susceptible to enemy
detection
▪ Enemy able to pinpoint and target soldiers' location
➢ Peraso mmWave technology is an inherently stealthy protocol
▪ Narrow beam, dynamic beam steering, oxygen attenuation
▪ Low Probability Detection, Low Probability Interception, Anti-jamming
➢ Peraso products offer SWAP (size, weight and power) benefits
➢ 60GHz unlicensed band ensures no interference with licensed
spectrum
➢ Use cases indicate potential for multiple radios per soldier;
potential market opportunity of millions of units
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 10
Adjacent End Market Opportunities
Transportation Professional Video Delivery
➢ Multiple existing industrial engagements ➢ Engaged with consumer and enterprise customers
for advanced applications
➢ Benefits: high data rates, secure and
reliable connectivity ➢ Benefits: high data rate (3 Gbps), low latency
(<5ms), low interference
➢ Design wins or proof of prototyping include:
➢ mmWave overcomes inherent limitations of
▪ Downloading security surveillance to server
traditional wireless solutions
▪ Uploading entertainment content
▪ Peraso’s beamforming, beam-steering resolves
▪ Track-to-train internet support
interference in high-congestion environments
▪ Train car to train car wireless links
▪ Low latency enables real-time user interaction with
video for gaming, classroom and remote healthcare
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 11
5G mmWave Approach
➢ Believe mmWave will be utilized to address 5G network congestion
▪ U.S. carriers to saturate network capacity of existing spectrum by 2025(1)
➢ Introduced world’s most highly integrated 5G mmWave beamformer
▪ Support for frequency bands from 24 GHz – 43 GHz (5G)
▪ Dual-stream MIMO support with two 16-channel beamforming arrays
➢ Only 5G mmWave beamformer designed for end-device rather than
infrastructure requirements
▪ Scalable for other applications (e.g., hotspots, small cells, etc)
➢ Dual-band architecture positions Peraso for potentially large
5G end-device market
➢ Active discussions and demonstrations
of evaluation module
▪ Sampling available to select customers
PRM5241 Beamformer Module
(1) Mobile Experts Inc. report, 5G Millimeter Wave | April 2023
Copyright © 2024 Peraso Inc. 12

Investment Summary
➢ Premier global supplier of 60GHz semiconductor devices
with a significant barrier to competition
➢ Shipping into high-growth markets with over 100 distinct
customer engagements in pipeline
➢ Original business thesis that wireless spectrum saturation
is driving need for mmWave spectrum
▪ Additional features, such as stealth operation expected
to make a significant contribution to growth
➢ End-of-life memory IC product line providing significant
contribution through Q1 2025
Ticker: PRSO (NASDAQ)

Positioning to be Leading Supplier of mmWave Silicon
Today Medium-Term Longer-Term
60 GHz (IEEE 802.11ad)
– In volume production with family of products for unlicensed FWA, VR and military applications
5G mmWave (24-43 GHz)
– Samples available of highly integrated 5G beamformer for 5G CPE opportunities
– Leverage leadership momentum in WISP FWA to 5G FWA carrier market
WiFi 8 (IEEE 802.11bn)
Peraso FWA Solution
– IEEE contemplating 60 GHz WiFi to support ultra-high data rates for AR/VR
– ‘In-room’ characteristic of 60 GHz reduces overlapping networks in MDUs
6G mmWave
– THz frequencies utilize common design
principles required for mmWave
Peraso Consumer Peraso 5G mmWave
Electronic Solution Antenna Module
